attributes.additional_details: Studies show how cannabis has help millions of people with several dieaseas , it is proven that it protects cells in the body and stops cancer from spreading, we are still looking for a cure for CANCER but what if medical use of cannabis is legalised and cannabis patients benefit from it and you never know could be a step forward to finding a cure for cancer and also many diseases that currently exist and diseases to be discovered in the future, cannabis is very beneficial and should be legal
attributes.background: i believe that cannabis should be legal as it would raise millions and even billions of pound into the government, it is proven to be less dangerous than alcohol but yet that is legal also cigarettes and alcohol have so many death rates compared to cannabis, also helps with many diseases!
